properties.description: The use of Shapley values in machine learning, particularly in the context of feature selection for models, applied to linear regression and other ML models for explainability and feature attribution.

To investigate the suitability and limitations of using Shapley values for feature selection in machine learning, address concerns with its axioms, and challenge the reliance on it for feature selection.
Shapley values may not align with the goals of feature selection due to imposed axioms, and may be counterproductive for feature selection.
